text: White Aryan Resistance (WAR) is a White supremacist Neo-Nazi organization in the United States. It was founded and led by former Ku Klux Klan "Grand Dragon" Tom Metzger. It is based in Warsaw, Indiana. Its views are seen as racist.White Aryan Resistance file at the FBI ==The Insurgent== Their newspaper The Insurgent has the motto "the most racist newspaper on earth." WAR uses the slogan "White Revolution is the Only Solution". ==References== Category:Racism Category:Fascism Category:Neo-Nazis Category:Neo-Nazism Category:United States Category:Christian terrorism Category:20th century in the United States
